Text: Draft Joint Stipulation of IssuesPlease find attached VNF Transmittal Memo Preliminary Draft Joint Stipulation of issues Patricia Fry Godley Van Ness Feldman VANDOCDOC VANDOCDOC

ACTION REQUIRED BY PM today Draft Stipulation of IssuesUnder the ALJs procedural schedule the Joint Stipulation of Issues is due Thursday August So far weve only received comments from Cheryl Foley and Dan Adamson on the first draft that was circulated Please find attached a second draft Since Joint means all parties we should circulate a draft among all the parties in EL no later than noon tomorrow even though theres slim hope for agreement among all parties Accordingly please provide your revisions and additions to the attached draft by PM today We will make an effort to integrate all comments and prepare to forward the draft to other parties by noon tomorrow Please also advise if you think we need to have a conference call to discuss the draft before we transmit it to the other parties tomorrow If you think we need the conference call well get one set up for AM tomorrow Thanks Patricia Fry Godley Van Ness Feldman VANDOCDOC

IMMEDIATE ACTION rd DRAFT JOINT STIPULATION OF ISSUESPlease find attached a rd draft of the Joint Stipulation of Issues It attempts to reflect the comments of about of the TFGs participants No one has requested a conference call Please keep in mind this is a DRAFT that will be circulated to all parties to EL tomorrow It will no doubt be subject to further negotiation While it is highly unlikely that all the parties will reach agreement on a Joint Stipulation by the due date on the procedural scheduleie Thursday August we nevertheless should make an effort to get it out to the other parties as early as possible tomorrow Accordingly please propose only those additional revisions that you feel are critical at this time If I have not heard from you by am EDT tomorrow August I will go ahead and serve the other parties with the document conspicuously marked DRAFT Dont you hate this process Regards Patricia Fry Godley Van Ness Feldman VANDOCDOC
